did.abstract: Aaron Owen was born on October 23, 1776 in Salisbury, Litchfield County, Connecticut. He became a merchant in Bainbridge, Chenango County, New York and died on January 13, 1846. The collection consists of a handwritten ledger

custodhist.p: Presented to the New York Genealogical and Biographical Society in 1945 by Mabel Owens Wilcox.

prefercite.p: Aaron Owen ledger, Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
